publicationstmt.publisher: Digital Collections and Archives, Tufts University

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2022-11-23 15:04:50 -0500.

repository.corpname: Digital Collections and Archives, Tufts University

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection is organized into one series.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection contains issues of the Tufts Journal beginning in 1980 published by the Office of Communications. It is a newspaper devoted to news about Tufts and Tufts staff members. It is "distributed free to members of the Tufts community." Distribution is monthly online, but only September-December and February-May in paper format. Beginning with the September 2001 issue the Tufts Journal became an online only publication. Begining November 2003, a paper version began publication again. After May 2006 the Tufts Journal became an online only publication. Missing: Vol. 19 #7 (April 1998).

processinfo.head: Processing status
processinfo.p: This collection is processed and open for research

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This series contains issues of The Tufts Journal. It is a monthly newspaper produced by the office of communications. It is "distributed free to members of the Tufts community" and devoted to news about Tufts and Tufts staff members. It began publication in 1980. Beginning with the September 2001 issue the Tufts Journal became an online only publication. In November 2003, it returned to paper format with distribution from September-December and February-May. It continues to be published monthly in an online format.
